Comment: " Pork barrel projects for Senators"  That is the only reason why. There is nothing wrong with the idea of the project and in fact, as a matter of national security we NEED to have access to space. If a strategic satellite needed to be replaced right now, we'd have to ask permission from Musk or Bezos... Just think about that... The US doesn't have it's own launch vehicle in the meantime.

Comment: ULA exists... Barely. I disagree. I think we are seeing two approaches to heavy lift design, and it's very clear SLS is the better approach compared to starship.

Comment: " I disagree. I think we are seeing two approaches to heavy lift design, and it's very clear SLS is the better approach compared to starship."  The issue is not the approach to heavy lift.
